name: Alfa Chemistry - Phytosterol (Beta-Sitosterol)
description: Alfa Chemistry (Dietary Supplements division) supplies Phytosterol (Beta-Sitosterol) with chemical structure similar to cholesterol. As a leading supplier of dietary ingredients, they offer high-quality phytosterols suitable for both cosmetic and dietary applications. Beta-sitosterol provides barrier support and anti-inflammatory benefits.
notes: Chemical structure similar to cholesterol allows barrier support function. Leading supplier of dietary ingredients with cosmetic applications. Beta-sitosterol is the most abundant phytosterol in plants. Suitable for both cosmetic and dietary supplement formulations.
